iti17:2.1: “Sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamanasassa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamanassa viharato bahiram anganti karitva nannam ekangampi samanupassami yam evam bahupakaram yathayidam, bhikkhave, kalyanamittata.
iti17:2.2: Kalyanamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti”ti.
iti17:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
